item.title: [Pi] duel arena chaalenge and attack options
item.dc:creator: @dgk_all_day1 dgk_all_day
item.description:
@dgk_all_day1 wrote:

i have this in client.java and when its liek this

if(duelStatus == 5) { getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1); } else { getPA().showOption(1, 0, "Challenge", 1); }
it shows challange option outside the arena that opens interface and starts game, then once inside there is no attack option.

and when i do it like this

if(duelStatus == 5) { getPA().showOption(1, 0, "Attack", 1); } else { getPA().showOption(1, 0, "Challenge", 1); }
it shows challenge still outside that works, but when you enter duel it shows the attack option but when u click it says you cannot challenge while in duel.
when i do these

} else { getPA().showOption(2, 0, "Challenge", 1); }
it shows challenge outside but, it does not do anything when you click it.
and

} else { getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Challenge", 1); }
when u do it like this it does not show challenge outside.
and with the top half done liek this

if(duelStatus == 5) { getPA().showOption(2, 0, "Attack", 1);
it shows attack option but does not do anything when u click on it.
and

if(duelStatus == 5) { getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);
it just doesnt show attack option at all?

can some1 help me with this please?

Read full topic
item.source: [Pi] duel arena chaalenge and attack options
